Articles.Content:
This is an option I have long yearned for in KSP. I have an absurdly powerful PC and at the resolutions I like to operate at make the text essentially unreadable. It would be most appreciated by many of the Kerbalphiles to be able to have the ability to adjust such an integral and intrinsic part of such a wonderful game, especially for those running at 4K or greater resolutions.
